Name: Ilia Rostovtsev
AboutMe:
SDE lead at Karateka - a video-sharing and data management system, that is solely dedicated to karate. Unregistered users can watch videos; registered users can upload videos, rate, comment and subscribe, create profiles and playlists; create, manage and share personal lists of members; apply to and generate bracket-sheets for competitions and even more.

Author of Authentic Theme - Webmin/Usermin/Virtualmin/Cloudmin theme based on Bootstrap and Font Awesome. It uses CodeMirror to highlight config files and show line numbers, when editing manually and DataTables to add advanced interaction controls to modules' tables. Theme runs using latest releases of dependent software (mentioned above), supporting all in-built modules (even ancient ones) and third-party modules, including ConfigServer Security & Firewall.
